title: DE Integrations
description: DE Integrations connect your RAG system with external tools, services, and data sources to enhance functionality and extend capabilities.
whatItDoes: DE Integration components allow your RAG system to connect with document stores, vector databases, LLM providers, and other services. They provide standardized interfaces for data exchange and functionality sharing.
whyItMatters: DE Well-designed integrations make your RAG system more powerful, flexible, and easier to maintain. They allow you to leverage specialized tools for different aspects of the RAG pipeline.
challenges: DE Managing authentication and credentials securely
DE Handling rate limits and API quotas
DE Ensuring consistent data formats across different services
DE Maintaining compatibility with evolving external APIs
DE Optimizing for cost and performance across integrated services
DE Inegrating with external tools (e.g. Sharepoint, Drive, etc.)
